TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: select l0, r2 from table(tumble(table L, descriptor(lts), interval '10' second)) a join table(tumble(table R, descriptor(rts), interval '10' second)) b on a.l0 = b.r0

LogicalProject(l0=[$0], r2=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[TUMBLE(DESCRIPTOR($1), 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER l0, TIME ATTRIBUTE(ROWTIME) lts, VARCHAR(20) l2, TIMESTAMP(6) window_start, TIMESTAMP(6) window_end)]) : +- LogicalProject(l0=[$0], lts=[$1], l2=[$2]) : +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[lts], watermark=[-($1, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, L]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[TUMBLE(DESCRIPTOR($1), 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER r0, TIME ATTRIBUTE(ROWTIME) rts, VARCHAR(20) r2, TIMESTAMP(6) window_start, TIMESTAMP(6) window_end)]) +- LogicalProject(r0=[$0], rts=[$1], r2=[$2]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rts], watermark=[-($1, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, R]])

Calc(select=[l0, r2]) +- Calc(select=[l0, r0, r2]) +- WindowJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(l0, lts)], select=[l0, lts, l2, window_start, window_end, r0, rts, r2, window_start0, window_end0], winCall=[TUMBLE(DESCRIPTOR($1), 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[l0]]) : +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[lts], watermark=[-(lts, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, L]], fields=[l0, lts, l2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[r0]]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rts], watermark=[-(rts, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, R]], fields=[r0, rts, r2])
